document.full_text: security forces wielding batons dispersed 150 demonstrators who had gathered in central of damascus on wednesday in the most serious protest against syria's ruling hierarchy since revolts spread in the arab world.
document.title: syrian forces break up damascus protest
lines_and_colors: security forces wielding batons dispersed 150 demonstrators who had gathered in central of damascus on wednesday in the most serious protest against syria's ruling hierarchy since revolts spread in the arab world.
